data.title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park
data.meta_description: Head to the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park for an entertaining and educational experience in Dayton, The Birthplace of Aviation.
data.text:
The Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park

Part of the National Park Service, the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park is made up of multiple sites! Explore more about it below, and plan your visit today to Dayton, the Birthplace of Aviation and So Much More!

More About the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park

The Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park is a five-unit park located in and around Dayton, Ohio. The Wright Dunbar Interpretive Center, Wright Cycle Co. Bike Shop and Huffman Prairie Flying Field Interpretive Center and the Wright Brothers Hill-Wright Brothers Memorial, Paul Laurence Dunbar House Historic Site and the Wright Brothers National Museum at Carillon Historical Park.

Please visit www.nps.gov/daav for updates about the status of the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Parkâ€™s visitor use facilities.

The Wright Cycle Company Complex

The Wright-Dunbar Interpretive Center

Aviation Trail, Inc. Visitor Center and Museum

The Wright Cycle Company building

16 South Williams Street, Dayton, OH 45402

Main phone #: (937) 225-7705

SUMMER HOURS (March - October) Open 10 a.m. - 4 p.m. Wednesday - Sunday

Huffman Prairie Flying Field Interpretive Center

2380 Memorial Road, Wright-Patterson AFB, OH 45433

Main phone #: (937) 425-0008

SUMMER HOURS (March - October) Open 10 a.m. - 4 p.m. Wednesday - Sunday

Dayton History at Carillon Historical Park -- Wright Brothers National Museum

1000 Carillon Boulevard, Dayton, OH 45409

Phone #: (937) 293-2841

Hours of Operation:

9:30 am to 5:00 pm Monday through Saturday

12:00 noon to 5:00 pm Sunday

Closed on the following days: Thanksgiving Day, December 24 & 25 and New Year's Eve and New Year's Day.

Paul Laurence Dunbar House Historic Site

219 North Paul Laurence Dunbar Street, Dayton, OH 45401

Hours of Operation:

10:00 am to 4:00 pm Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday

Closed Tuesday through Thursday

Closed on the following holidays: Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day.

Last tour begins at 3:30 pm

For more information call (937) 225-7705

Hawthorn Hill

For more information and tour reservations,

contact Dayton History at Carillon Historical Park at (937) 293-2841

Mansion tours and times:

10:00 am and 12:30 pm Wednesdays and Saturdays
